Package characters

Class Person

java.lang.Object
java.awt.geom.RectangularShape
java.awt.geom.Rectangle2D
java.awt.geom.Rectangle2D.Double
characters.Person
All Implemented Interfaces:
Shape, Serializable, Cloneable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Monster, Player
public class Person extends Rectangle2D.Double
This class represents any person (player or monster) that appears in the game. A person can change speed and direction and jump. Objects of this class can't get inside of platforms, and they can use portals.
Author:
Ilai Tamari
See Also:
Serialized Form

    • standing

      public Platform standing​(ArrayList<Platform> platforms)
      Check if a person is standing on a platform by checking for each individual platform if the person intersects it.
      Parameters:
      platforms - All platforms in the game
      Returns:
      the platform on which the person stands, or null if person is in the air
